items.summary: Update the CreateItemForm component to check if the authenticated user has configured Stripe settings before allowing item creation. If Stripe is not configured, display a message guiding the user to complete their artist profile in Settings first, with a prominent link to the Settings page.
Add a query hook in useQueries.ts to fetch the current user's Stripe configuration status, enabling the CreateItemForm to check if Stripe settings are configured before allowing item creation.
